text: Tum mein say jo buzurgi aur kushadgi walay hain unhen apnay qarabat daron aur miskeeno aur mohajiron ko fi sabeelillah denay say qasam na kha leni chahaye bulkay moaf ker dena aur dar-guzar ker lena chahaye. Kiya tum nahi chahtay kay Allah Taalaa tumharay qasoor moaf farma dey? Allah qasooron ko moaf farmaney wala meharban hai
